name: Hexplosion
description:
Quick prototype built in Unity. Blow up slimes, and aim for a high score. Try not to blow yourself up!

Controls: 

Use WASD to move. Press the left mouse button to prep a bomb. Release the left mouse button to hurl it at the cursor. 

Resources Used:

Enemy: http://opengameart.org/content/blobby

Bomb: http://opengameart.org/content/oldschool-bomb

Bomb Witch: https://openclipart.org/detail/171616/cartoon-witch-silhouette-by-clipartstockphoto-171616

Projectile: http://opengameart.org/content/projectile-acidshot

Bomb Sound: https://www.freesound.org/people/Isaac200000/sound...

Fire: http://opengameart.org/content/lpc-flames
